card.name: Wattaildragon
card.description: Capable of indefinite flight. Attacks by wrapping its body with electricity and ramming into opponents.IMPORTANT: Capturing the "Wattaildragon" is forbidden by the Ancient Rules and is a Level 6 offense, the minimum sentence for which is imprisonment for no less than 2500 heliocycles.

card.name: Luster Dragon
card.description: A very beautiful dragon covered with sapphire. It does not like fights, but has incredibly high attack power.

card.name: Hunter Dragon
card.description: This dragon has taken down countless prey with its sharp fangs. It strikes very quickly, because if it does not strike first it is vulnerable to a counter-attack.

card.name: Millennium Shield
card.description: A famous shield said to belong to an ancient Egyptian Pharaoh. Legends tell of its power to block any strong attack.

card.name: Dark Blade
card.description: They say he is a dragon-manipulating warrior from the dark world. His attack is tremendous, using his great swords with vicious power.

card.name: Warrior Dai Grepher
card.description: The warrior who can manipulate dragons. Nobody knows his mysterious past.

card.name: Chamberlain of the Six Samurai
card.description: The Six Samurai are supported from the shadows by this silent and mysterious warrior. His past is unknown to them, but his countless scars are proof of his experience.

card.name: Mystical Elf
card.description: A delicate elf that lacks offense, but has a terrific defense backed by mystical power.

card.name: Stargazer Magician
card.description: Once per turn, when exactly 1 other Pendulum Monster you control (and no other cards) is returned to your hand by an opponent's card effect (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon 1 monster from your hand with the same name as that returned to the hand.

card.name: Timegazer Magician
card.description: Each turn, the first card(s) in your Pendulum Zone that would be destroyed by an opponent's card effect, is not destroyed.

card.name: Aether, the Empowering Dragon
card.description: When this card is Pendulum Summoned: You can target 1 card on the field; return it to the hand. You can only use this effect of "Aether, the Empowering Dragon" once per turn.

card.name: Ventdra, the Empowered Warrior
card.description: This card can attack your opponent directly. If this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: You can target 1 Dragon, Warrior, or Spellcaster-Type Normal Monster in your Graveyard; add it to your hand.

card.name: Arnis, the Empowered Warrior
card.description: When this card you control is destroyed by battle with an opponent's attacking monster and sent to your Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 Spellcaster-Type monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck in Attack Position.

card.name: Terratiger, the Empowered Warrior
card.description: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Normal Monster from your hand in Defense Position.

card.name: Hydrotortoise, the Empowered Warrior
card.description: FLIP: Target 1 Spell/Trap Card your opponent controls; destroy it.

card.name: Golden Dragon Summoner
card.description: You can Tribute 1 monster, then target 1 monster on the field; return it to the hand. You can only use this effect of "Golden Dragon Summoner" once per turn.

card.name: Blue Dragon Summoner
card.description: If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can add 1 Dragon, Warrior, or Spellcaster Normal Monster from your Deck to your hand.

card.name: Red Sparrow Summoner
card.description: When this card you control is destroyed by battle with an opponent's attacking monster and sent to your Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 Warrior-Type monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck in Attack Position.

card.name: White Tiger Summoner
card.description: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Normal Monster from your hand. All monsters you control gain 100 ATK and DEF.

card.name: Green Turtle Summoner
card.description: FLIP: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it.

card.name: Sorcerous Spell Wall
card.description: All monsters you control gain 300 ATK during your turn only. All monsters you control gain 300 DEF during your opponent's turn only.

card.name: Supply Squad
card.description: Once per turn, if a monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Lightning Vortex
card.description: Discard 1 card; destroy all face-up monsters your opponent controls.

card.name: Mystical Space Typhoon
card.description: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

card.name: Ego Boost
card.description: When a monster declares an attack: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; it gains 1000 ATK until the end of the Battle Phase.

card.name: Axe of Despair
card.description: (This card is always treated as an "Archfiend" card.)The equipped monster gains 1000 ATK. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: You can Tribute 1 monster; place this card on the top of your Deck.

card.name: Lucky Iron Axe
card.description: The equipped monster gains 500 ATK. If this face-up card you control is destroyed by your opponent's card effect and sent to your Graveyard: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Monster Reincarnation
card.description: Discard 1 card, then target 1 monster in your GY; add it to your hand.

card.name: Dark Factory of Mass Production
card.description: Target 2 Normal Monsters in your GY; add them to your hand.

card.name: Poison of the Old Man
card.description: Activate 1 of these effects;●Gain 1200 LP.●Inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

card.name: Trap Hole
card.description: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons 1 monster with 1000 or more ATK: Target that monster; destroy that target.

card.name: Sakuretsu Armor
card.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; destroy that target.

card.name: Raigeki Break
card.description: Discard 1 card, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it.

card.name: Dust Tornado
card.description: Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy that target, then you can Set 1 Spell/Trap from your hand.

card.name: Shadow Spell
card.description: Activate this card by targeting 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; it loses 700 ATK, also it cannot attack or change its battle position. When it leaves the field, destroy this card.

card.name: A Hero Emerges
card.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Your opponent chooses 1 random card from your hand, then if it is a monster that can be Special Summoned, Special Summon it. Otherwise, send it to the Graveyard.

card.name: Soul Resurrection
card.description: Activate this card by targeting 1 Normal Monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it in Defense Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. When that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

card.name: Jar of Greed
card.description: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Magic Jammer
card.description: When a Spell Card is activated: Discard 1 card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

card.name: Seven Tools of the Bandit
card.description: When a Trap Card is activated: Pay 1000 LP; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.
